release_note: Fixed several minor bugs.
Fixed several minor bugs.

In April ABBYY separated the Russian division into a separate business outside the group of companies. A new technology partner the Content AI company Content AI LLC continues to work with all current and new clients and partners of the company in Russia. The rights to the Lingvo family of electronic dictionaries have been transferred to Content AI. Now we support and develop the product under our own brand together with the previous development team. Meet Lingvo under a new brand! Users have access to the previous functionality of the application and all previously issued subscriptions.
Bug fixes and performance improvements
Changed the authorization methods in the app if you have any problems please contact our support service at lingvo_support abbyy.com Fixed several minor issues.
Fixed several minor issues.

Hi Language friends! Happy to inform you that we ve updated our app! CHANGES of 1.51: fixed issues associated with iOS 13 SDK returned full text translation. We hope you like this update and will find time to leave a review on our Lingvo App Store page. Always with you ABBYY Lingvo Team
Minor issues fixed.

Hi Language friends! Happy to inform you that we ve updated our app! CHANGES of 1.50: added delete search history completely redesigned Today Extension added a logout confirmation dialog improvement of interface for iPhone X bug fixes We hope you like this update and will find time to leave a review on our Lingvo App Store page. Always with you ABBYY Lingvo Team

Hi Lingvo Live friends! Happy to inform you that we ve updated our app! CHANGES: bug fixes support for iPhone X! We hope that you like this update and you will find time to leave a review on our Lingvo App Store page. Always with you Lingvo Live Team
Hi Lingvo Live friends! To make your experience more enjoyable there are some minor improvements from us. Hope you keep on learning a foreign language with us! Always at your hand Lingvo Live Team

Dear friends we have great news! In this release we are happy to announce a new long awaited feature: Notifications to new comments on your translation requests or posts. Get immediate information on people s reaction to your questions and posts. Additionally there are a few nice little things: change the status for several flashcards at once. improved logic for translation. choose the lesson size in Flashcards for 15 30 50 75 100 or all flashcards. Hope you enjoy the improvements! We would appreciate your positive reviews on the App Store. Thank you! Keep Learning Lingvo Live Team We will be glad to see your good reviews on the Lingvo Live page in the App Store! Keep learning The Lingvo Live team

In this interim release we have improved some minor things and made life a little easier for those who help people with translation. Enjoy a separate tab QUESTIONS WITHOUT ANSWERS . Help others with translations and people will help you. FLASHCARDS Export your flashcards by email. NOTIFICATIONS If you have a notification go to it directly by tapping on your profile pic. We would be very happy if you leave us a good review on the App Store Keep learning Lingvo Live Team

In this update we present some nice improvements: We ve fixed an error of flashcard deletion. Some usability improvements. We would be very happy if you leave us a good review on the App Store Keep learning Lingvo Live Team

In this update we have some improvements: Now you can easily ask for translation tapping Live translation button in the search bar! Delete your posted comments by swiping left Also we fixed some insignificant bugs. Follow our updates! It only gets better! We would be very happy if you left us a good review on the App Store Keep learning Lingvo Live Team

In this update we fixed some bugs. Now the app will be even more enjoyable to use: translate words and texts help others with translations and learn words using flashcards! Follow our updates! It only gets better! And...we would be very happy if you left us a good review on the App Store Keep learning Lingvo Live Team

In this latest release we are happy to present a new simplified interface with tabs to help you easily switch from one section to another. We are working on a few surprises and are looking forward to your comments. Your feedback in the App Store is very useful both to us the developers and to other users of the app.
bug fix

IMPROVEMENTS Enjoy the new Lingvo Live News Feed design! NEW FEATURES Learn a foreign language by most frequently used conversational phrases! Choose a set of flashcards for a certain topic to train English German French Spanish Italian Portuguese Russian Listen and repeat after native speakers Enjoy and share your impressions with us by writing a review! Learn a foreign language by most frequently used conversational phrases. Choose a set of flashcards for a certain topic to train English German French Spanish Italian Portuguese Russian. Listen and repeat after native speakers. Enjoy and share your impressions with us by writing a review!
Synchronized flashcards! Now all the flashcards you create on your IPhone can be accessed from any other Apple device. Stay with us! Even better news is coming soon!

This interim release includes some —Åool features for IOS 10: SPEECH RECOGNITION IN FLASHCARDS . Pronounce the translation of the word in the Flashcard and the app will tell you whether it is correct or not. Practice your pronunciation and vocabulary knowledge. TODAY WIDGET. Create a flashcard immediately in the widget. iMESSAGE. Translate instantly within iMessage. While we are working on more cool new features to add to the app please inspire us with your feedback in the App Store!
bug fix

A fantastic new feature: now you can learn foreign language phrases for use across a wide range of everyday situations. Enjoy the pronunciation by native speakers. Choose a language your are learning out of English French Spanish Italian German and Portuguese. And this is all for free.

Our colorful folders will sure be of help. Your comments and five star ratings in the App Store motivate us to keep doing our best to produce a cool product. Please update your version and tell us what you think! FOLDERS CATEGORIES FOR CARDS. Learning words has become more convenient! Now you can create GROUPS of cards and learn words by topic. Our colored daddies will help you. If you ve tried Lingvo Live and have something to share don t hesitate to leave your impressions on the product page. You will help other users make the right choice!

GOOD NEWS Start building your vocabulary! Now you can save the words you don t know to your personalized vocabulary list and learn them using flashcards. 1. Just look up a new word in Lingvo Live dictionaries 2. Tap the academic cap button in the dictionary entry 3. Choose the word translation or definition you would like to learn 4. Voila! The word is in your vocabulary list now ready for learning We would appreciate if you could leave us a Review. Thank you! Keep Learning ABBYY Lingvo Live Team

Application now fully supports iOS 9. New introduction screen. Quick access for translation search notifications and your posts for iPhone 6s iPhone 6s plus We would appreciate if you could Write a Review. This helps us know how to make Lingvo Live even better. Thank you!

Apple fans are thrilled to bits after the latest announcements and here we are adding more enjoyment to Lingvo Live for Apple gadgets! Update for sure to iOS 9 Lingvo Live runs smoothly and stable. The Share button is in plain sight now just like the Like and Comments buttons. Share the coolest translations in a flash with your favorite social networks and messengers! News feed scrolling goes faster: pics displaying algorithm has been improved. The school year is here the amount of your language questions in the feed has jumped dramatically and you may be willing to comment or recommend us on the AppStore Lingvo Live page. You are most welcome! Keep Learning ABBYY Mobile Team
Register at Lingvo Live and get a special gift from ABBYY! Just tap the top left menu and create your profile!

Share your favorite translations and notes from Lingvo Live on Facebook Twitter email or SMS. Use action menu in the left corner and publish Lingvo Live posts on social media! Leave us a review to help our language lovers community grow!

Share Lingvo Live posts anywhere you want: in social media messengers email sms. Open action menu in the left corner of the post and tap Copy link. Another useful feature now you can get a notification when your translation request was answered. Ask other users for translations and get notified when the translations are added!

Now you can see Lingvo Live widget in iPhone Notification Center! Discover new words and phrases every day! Swipe down the screen open Today scroll current widgets and tap Edit. Move Lingvo Live widget into the active list on the top by tapping . Done! Now all the new language facts are at your fingertips.

Welcome the Lingvo Live for iPhone 6 and 6 . Now it is adapted for the large screens of the latest iPhone models! Your feedback will add us energy for further improvements. Do not hesitate to drop us a review!
According to your numerous requests we changed the background images in Lingvo Live. Download this update to enjoy the improved interface.
